TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultProfile extends System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase

Docs.summary: Represents a user-profile instance when no profile properties are defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Profile.DefaultProfile> class is used by ASP.NET to return a default instance of a user profile when the profile feature is enabled but no properties are defined.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Profile.DefaultProfile> class is used by ASP.NET to return a default instance of a user profile when the profile feature is enabled but no properties are defined.
